title: Top Places to visit in Sheohar, Bihar
content: Sheohar is an administrative district in the state of Bihar in India. The district headquarters are located at Sheohar, and the district is a part of Tirhut Division. This district was carved out of Sitamarhi district in 1994 due to the extreme efforts of Raghunath Jha, former Union Minister. Emi

Top Places to visit in Siwan, Bihar
content: Siwan is a city and the district headquarters of the Siwan district in the Indian state of Bihar. It is also block headquarter of Siwan block. title: Top Places to visit in Supaul, Bihar
content:
Supaul is a town and a municipality that is headquarters of Supaul district in the Indian state of Bihar. The Supaul town is the administrative headquarters of this district.
Supaul district is one of the thirty-eight districts of Bihar state, India, and Supaul town is the administrative

title: Top Places to visit in Vaishali (Hajipur), Bihar
Top Places to visit in West Champaran (Bettiah), Bihar
content: West Champaran is an administrative district in the state of Bihar in India, located just 60 km (37 mi) west of Birgunj. It is a part of Tirhut Division[1] (Tirhut). The district headquarters are located in Bettiah. The district is known for its fluid border with Nepal. One of the major location

title: Top Places to visit in Nicobar (Car Nicobar), Andaman and Nicobar
Top Places to visit in North and Middle Andaman (Mayabunder), Andaman and Nicobar
content:
North and Middle Andaman district is one of the 3 districts of the Indian Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands located in the Bay of Bengal. Mayabunder town is the district headquarters. The area covered by this district is 3251.85 km2.

title: Top Places to visit in South Andaman (Port Blair), Andaman and Nicobar
content: South Andaman district is one of the 3 districts of the Indian Union Territory of Andaman and Nicobar Islands located in the Bay of Bengal. Port Blair town, the capital of the Union Territory is the district headquarters. The area covered by this district is 2980 km².

title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Anantapuramu mandal and also the divisional headquarters of Anantapur revenue division. The city is located on National Highway. It was also the headquarters

title: Top Places to visit in Chittoor, Andhra Pradesh
content: Chittoor is a city and district headquarters in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is also the mandal and divisional headquarters of Chittoor mandal and Chittoor revenue division, respectively. The city has a population of 2,89,625 and that of the agglomeration is 3,53,76

title: Top Places to visit in East Godavari , Kakinada , Andhra Pradesh
content: East Godavari district or Toorpu Godavari Jilla is a district in Coastal Andhra region of Andhra Pradesh, India. Its district headquarters is at Kakinada.
